Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of the 79-year-old woman by stating that she rescued two LAPD officers from a street gang using an AK-47.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to verify the existence of the 79-year-old woman and her actions.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the story is a fabrication and has been flagged as false by Facebook.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the story is true without considering the evidence or credibility of the source.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating biases in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a fictional story as a true act of heroism.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias present in the claim.
